website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a touchless trash can with versatile power options and few complaints, this is a good choice.
pros: Offers similar features as competitors without the need for batteries – comes with AC adapter
Can be operated by 4 D batteries
Oval design makes it easy to add/remove bags
cons: A few users wish the lid closed a bit slower
otherwise it earns more praise than complaints

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can!  Excellent delivery service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can. It works very nice. However, I'm having a problem removing the cover for the battery compartment. Otherwise, I'm loving it! Provides enough time to take my hand away, and it has a nice wide opening. It also came packed very securely. I use the generic 13 gallon trash can liners and it's just fine. I also placed some laundry boost scent beads at the bottom of the can and its been smelling great for weeks. Hope this info helps.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Works good but....
customer_reviews.text: Well I like this thing but be warned it is quite sensitive. Make sure you have a place to put it where you are less likely to open it when you didn't mean to. We had it where our old foot operated can sat and found out just walking by this can too closely will open it. We had to relocate it to stop the walk by openings. If I had kept the box I would definitely consider returning it. We are now just considering turning the sensor off and using it manually. I didn't want to rate it poorly because it works good, maybe too good.
customer_reviews.author: Shafferfarm

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at all of the positive reviews. This product, compared to the one I bought two years ago, is flimsy and poorly designed. The trash bag top hangs over the outside, visible in my kitchen, whereas the one I am replacing has an internal and an external can allowing for everything to be concealed. I will gladly pay $30 more to get a well-engineered product. This one goes to the garage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barton

customer_reviews.title: ISO fitment and Operation
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, fitment within iso specs. Ez peezee to change your generic 13 gallon trash bags... BONUS...comes with a gasket to hold bag in place, until top is placed back on...2x Bonus.. NO BATTERYS!!! Won't ever have to touch a lid again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Finally! No More Battery Changing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, silent automatic trashcan allows you to take out the trash without touching the dirty surface of the lid. This one specifically allows you to enjoy these perks without dealing with changing and buying the batteries each couple of weeks. Sabe some money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Jess V.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love it. The motion detection works really well, sometimes opening just when I stand in front of it. The can fits well in my small pantry. Love the fact that it came with an AC adapter so we don’t have to worry about changing batteries. Taking out and replacing the garbage bags is easy. 13 gallon bags fit well with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The fact you can plug it in is the best part!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a touch-less trash can for years and had to get a new one. This one works perfectly for me as it is plugged in so no need for batteries that are usually in the lid that could and have fallen into the trash. It’s a little shorter than I would like, but the plug in is why I kept it. It opens fast and stays open for a good amount of time b4 closing :)
customer_reviews.author: YmaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical of ordering a garbage can vs finding one in the store
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of ordering a garbage can vs finding one in the store. After reading reviews loading cart up with all prospects and eliminating. I chose this one. Garbage can arrived secure and flawless in packaging. Using the AC Adpater until my batteries arrive. Works great. The garbage can fits flush against wall which was a festure that was important to me. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: We like it!!
customer_reviews.text: My first preference would be to have the trash concealed under the counter, but we moved into a smaller house, and that wasn't feasible. This touchless sensor can, is the next best thing. It looks attractive and matches our appliances, and opens very easily as advertised. It holds a large kitchen trash bag securely, and the top of the bag doesn't really show or isn't noticeable. We like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good product
customer_reviews.text: I already had one from 2 years ago and that is still going strong. I moved to a place where trash can pickup is weekly and trash bin is smaller than compost. They also must be in different bags. Thus I ordered one more for compost. I think it’s pricey but it won’t disappoint you. At first you might get annoyed by its super sensitive lids. They would open even when we walk past by. But now we are used to it and leave enough distance. Overall I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: automatic lid is quiet
customer_reviews.text: loving this automatic lid and how quiet it is when opening and closing. also like the blinking lights when the automatic lid is getting ready to close wide opening is nice and lights are visible but not glaring all in all very happy with this purchase especially since it was on the lower end price wise when compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: creativeenergy

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trash can January 2020. It functioned properly for about two months. The defect seems to me to be related to the power cord that plugs into the trash can. It not longer fits snugly in the hole and won’t stay in. Furthermore, even when I hold the power cord in - it doesn’t power the lid. For the cost of the trash can I had hoped for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: even with Amazon prime which I love!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping =) I work on Okinawa with the USAF and it generally takes a couple weeks to get stuff here, even with Amazon prime which I love!!! I really like the plug in...spent a ton on battery's on my last one that finally died. My only reservation is the top ring that holds the bag in place could be a little more heavy. I also like the option to use batteries but don't think I ever will.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix it

customer_reviews.title: A good word about their customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trash can in February. A few weeks ago, the sensor failed on the lid, causing the door to open and close by itself. I unplugged it and left it overnight, then plugged it back in, but it didn’t help. I called the 800 service number (right on the inside of the can) and spoke to a very nice customer service person. She sent me a new lid (which arrived today), reminded me to make sure I didn’t toss the power plug or the filter, told me to just dispose of the faulty lid, and everything works great! Couldn’t ask for a better experience!
customer_reviews.author: G. Sands

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: She said the motion detector very seldom works. Most frustrating when trying to put wet/bloody meat packages in can, then you have to do it manually. She's putting it it her garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! 2+ year update added
customer_reviews.text: Two year update: I love this can. It’s working great. No problems!! I can’t understand what these ppl are complaining about? Of course it opens when you walk by. It’s a motion sensor! Move it. It’s doing what it’s meant to do. Honestly, there is nothing wrong with this can, I can find nothing to complain about. My dogs don’t like it.oh, that’s a plus. Awesome trash can! Just plug it in. No batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaRN

customer_reviews.title: Registering Product - RIP OFF/QuALITY
customer_reviews.text: This is the second can that I have had to purchase in less than 2 years. I decided to bit the bullet and buy another one. Yes - Shame on me. I DID NOT register my first one thinking I was safe. It broke and could NOT get it replaced because I did not register it. I bought another one and I have been trying for over a week to get it registered and collect my free sample and they make it nearly impossible. Not even an email response. DON'T FALL FOR IT.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something for a newly remodeled bathroom at work. This is by far the best deal I have found for this type of trash can. I bought the other two at more than double this price. It has both the adapter option as well as battery. It is more sanitary and classes up the joint a bit!
customer_reviews.author: C. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive for walkways. Update: Scotch tape fixed that!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen and the can is at the edge of the counter, along side of a walkway through the kitchen. We've only had it plugged in for a half hour and so far, everyone that walked past the can has set off the motion sensor. The lid on the can is smaller then the actual can by a few inches. I'll have to wait and see if the constant opening and closing will be worth the convenience. Updated: We've manage to decrease the sensitivity by putting 2 or 3 pieces of scotch tape over the sensor. The sensor still works but only when I'm right above the can. Much improved with an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: myhale

customer_reviews.title: Easy operating door
customer_reviews.text: Attractive for kitchen use. Easily opens by the motion of your hand. Better for compacting than spending your money for a compactor. This is a replacement for a six year old that would open but not close automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly U.

customer_reviews.title: Good can, but a better one is out there
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this can. It opens and closes well, holds a good amount of trash, and the bag ring holds the trash bag nicely. My one complaint is that the proximity sensor is too sensitive. When we walk by the can, the lid opens. Since buying this, I see that they have come out with a different design with dual hinged lids and a sensor on the side. I wish I had seen that before ordering this one. Still, it's a great can, but the overly sensitive sensor knocks off two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Had a NineStar Battery operated for 2 years. Batteries were hard to deal with.. very nasty. This AC plug sensor can is a million times better and built overall quality.. very very well built.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS A TOLEDO

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a chance but 5 months in and it has died. I thought having a can that had a power cord and a battery would last longer. This actually died in less than 6 months with normal use. I don’t suggest buying this one, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Got to prevent dog from getting in garbage. Works too well.
customer_reviews.text: I got this dog because we used those foot action trash bins, but she was able to pull the trash out by biting the trash bag on the side and pulling on it. With this one, within 5 seconds she sniffed it and it opened up. However, there is an easy access switch on the back so I just turn it off when I leave the house. BUT...apparantly the fact that it moves on its own is scary to her. She makes sure to stay at least a few feet from the trash can, and when walking by she walks a little faster. I'm wondering if this device combined with the Roomba is a little too much for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cole

customer_reviews.title: The best trash can for anywhere.....
customer_reviews.text: It is great! You don't have to use both hands to open the trash can and use the other one to discard the trash. It is just great and you don't spill trash around the can trying to open the lid and keep it open. The trash bag holder on the inside keeps the bag from sinking to the bottom of trash can!!! Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CurleyBob1957

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Was Hoping For...
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this trash can, but I haven’t even had it for 30 days & now the lid is making a grinding/cracking noise every time it closes which I’m not happy about. I can’t find a way to contact the seller about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: LLR

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 12 months
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful for 11 months. It now will not open by itself. Somehow for over $70, I expected it to last longer than 11 months!
customer_reviews.author: stefgmama

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage can!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you don't have to use batteries! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I love my trash can. The only thing is, it doesn’t hold a lot of trash. It isn’t very big. My old trash can was 13 gallons also. I have a family of 4 and I also own a daycare and could get away with taking our trash out every other day. Now we fill the trash can up. Take the bag out and fill the bag up some more. So this can isn’t as big as our others we’ve had. I do really like the fact that I don’t have to touch the can at all. I just wave my hand and it opens.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Top of Can Does Not Keep Oval Shape
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the metal Trash Can is too thin a material so that the Oval Shape becomes distorted and makes it difficult to seat the Oval Molded Plastic Sensor Lid onto the Metal Trash Can. You have to really work to get Sensor top to seat properly and keep the plastic bags from falling into can. It would have been a better design if the Metal top of Can was machined with a rolled lip in order to have its oval shape match with the molded plastic sensor top piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving around the kitchen cooking and cleaning much easier
customer_reviews.text: When could anyone get really excited about a trash can? I’m 2020 - that’s when! Absolutely love the ease of throwing things away. Old can was plastic and it was a pain to keep the bag in place and remove and replace the lid when changing trash liner. The only thing I would say could even remotely be a negative is the actual lid part that raises up and down is a little flimsy but I’m thinking it needs to be light for this to work properly. Still, it’s an awesome sensor trash can!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and super easy to set up! Came with a cord so yay! No batteries :). It might be a little too sensitive to motion, it’s activates with me just walking by. I might just be walking too close but hey that means it’s working! It stays open long enough for you to do what you have to take care of and unlike some others; if it senses you’re still there it will stay open longer.
customer_reviews.author: Collegekid

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: It works great. And there is a switch to turn the motion sensor on and off, which we use because of the toddler. Sometimes it gets glitchy if its activated alot, or if you lift the lid instead of letting the sensor automatically lift it. My only complaint is that it didn't come with a cord to plug into the wall, and the seller was unresponsive with my messages. But where we keep it right now there is no outlet anyway so we use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great (necessary) kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: Love this garbage can. A strange thing to say? Maybe. But it's true. I love that it plugs in so I don't have to change batteries. And when my youngest child is in the kitchen with me, pulling himself along every surface, I can unplug it so the lid doesn't open for him. I can throw things away without touching a lid and spreading stickiness and/or germs to yet another surface. The order neutralizer it came with definitely helps keep the garbage smell at bay as well. Easy to get full garbage bags out of, and surface wipes clean easily. This was totally worth the money for me and my family (which includes young children). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KissMyConverse

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how well this works. As long as you have an AC plug near where you'll have the trash can, you will like not having to worry about replacing batteries. Note well that all versions of this that are being sold at Amazon do not contain the AC adapter as a part of the purchase. Read carefully, or be prepared to have to go back and source it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: George Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Sensor arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. The seller should check his product before selling it. The sensor doesn't work at all only the manual button works. And the trash can was bent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fun trash can. I bought this because there is No battery. It plugs in. Works great. My granddaughter loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the fact that it's not too sensitive and i ...
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with this purchase so far. love the fact that it's not too sensitive and i can plug in, no need to replace batteries.
customer_reviews.author: sukhwinder k.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t open automatically- and fruit flys can get in.
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because Holds trash, but the lid does not work. In fact when people come over there’s a whole conversation and joke about it “how does it work.” It doesn’t and you have to use your finger to oddly open it. The automatic doesn’t work. Only sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: valene22

customer_reviews.title: This one won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: It does what’s intended. Wave your hand over the lid and it opens so you don’t have to touch the can. Cool. It’s not a sturdy item. My kid knocked the can over while emptying it and it bent pretty easily. Now the top piece doesn’t fit on the can because the can is misshaped. My last sensor can, that I got from Home Depot, lasted years without any trouble. I think I’ll get my next one from there.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Best value for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have an iTouchless trash can that's square and I wanted something that was rectangular or oval and this trash can was the best one I could find that came with an adapter. I didn't give it a higher rating because I wish the opening was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: DDP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I hate touching garbage can lids. (Little OCD) The motion sensor works perfectly. I have the small one in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Fun size
customer_reviews.text: Great product; just wish it was about a foot taller
customer_reviews.author: TY A

customer_reviews.title: Has issues.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this less than 3 months and now the lid opens and closes but opens immediately again. It doesn’t detect that it should be closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Designed for user friendlyness. Very sleek and functional. Slightly too sensitive, when we walk past it can sometimes go off, exposing the smells inside
customer_reviews.author: james elliott

customer_reviews.title: I wish it locked
customer_reviews.text: That is all. Other than the kids thinking it is a toy it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Kane

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well. Just plug the cord into an outlet and watch it work. I'm very pleased with the waste-can and it does everything that it supposed to do. Additionally, I thought it was price well. and it is easy to clean and care for. The only "Con" is that it is a lid is only 23" high in the front which is a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M. Middendorf

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Only, it occassionally opens as I walk past. I can deal with that!
customer_reviews.author: nope. not yet.

customer_reviews.title: No fuss and no mess!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can, not only for being stainless steel, but because it functions on battery OR electricity. I have it standing beside my refrigerator and plugged it in (cord was included with the trash can) behind the fridge itself. It opens and closes when I need it to, it's easy to lift a full bag of trash out and super easy to put a new bag in. I've had a lot of compliments on my new fancy trash can and a couple of folks have asked me for the link so they can get one too! You can't go wrong with this can; you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Good price, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can holds a lot. My 13gal bags are always full. I have to keep a baggie of baking soda at the bottom because the cab does get really smelly. We’ve had this for about 2 months and are happy with it. Easy to wipe down and clean. The lid closes really fast, so if we are scrapping in leftovers chances are we don’t have enough time to pull the plate away before the lid hits the plate and makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: MamaPb

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: It's so great have a motion-detecting trash can. I was considering a battery-operated one but decided I can spare an outlet in the long run. Very sleek design, with a ring inside that hides your garbage bag from peeping out. You can press the open button if you need the lid open for longer than 6 seconds (feels like a minute). I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laya

customer_reviews.title: No Need For Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this does not need batteries, but it’s not as sturdy as I would have hoped it would be. It bends very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Te

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a couple of months, no problems have occurred and you can really fit a lot of trash in it! The motion sensor works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Brolin

customer_reviews.title: Great Produt
customer_reviews.text: I really impressed with this no hands trash can. I had one using batteries which would always need replacing. I bought this because of the AC adapter. It's very nice, easy o assemble, works great and I never need to change or buy batteries again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i haven't had it very long but so far it works great
customer_reviews.author: dewitt johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage can. Competes with the more pricey ones.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item for my wife, I did have that feeling that being for the price, this can would not perform to our expectations and would have some sort of flaw. Well since we got the item, we are overly pleased with its performance and its motion detection. This can ranks up there with the best and most expensive ones on the market. I highly recommend anyone wanting one of these types of garbage cans to consider buying this one. Not only are you paying a great price, but are receiving a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Came scratched and dented
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected a well made product but what I got was an item that was dented from the inside out and a scratched lid. The dent couldn't have happened from shipping since it's pushed out not in. It would have happened during manufacturing same with the scratch. They need to work on their quality check before shipping a damage product. Especially when that product is being sold for 75 dollar. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Wittenstrom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even last two months.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered April 4th and today is May 26th and it already doesn’t work the lid keeps opening and closing in its own. Amazon doesn’t come to the phone this is so sad a defective product and no amazon customer service? Guess I donated $62 to a company that is already rich?
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Greene

customer_reviews.title: Hands free lid great for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This trash receptacle is very convenient in the kitchen when you don’t want to touch the lid. Just a wave of the hand opens the lid and it automatically closes. I also like that I do not have to replace batteries (unless I choose not to use the electric cord). I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste the money
customer_reviews.text: Thin and smaller than expected. Lid refuses to close! I have unplugged, turned off and on, etc. opens no problem but will not close even pushing the button for manual close. Waste of money but husband threw out packaging so too difficult to return now.
customer_reviews.author: JennFlinn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am using for diapers. Fantastic. Do not have to touch anything. Easy to refill new trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Sensor Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The first trash can I ordered had a large dent so I had to send it back via UPS. The second arrived and has a small dent in the front but I decided to keep it rather than the hassle of sending it back. However, the lid isn't working. They tell you to wipe the sensor, remove the batteries and try the lid again in two hours. This didn't work. This item is much more cheaply made than my previous can which what also a lot cheaper. For this price I would go to a regular store where you can see the item in person.
customer_reviews.author: June Giuffo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product and ended up purchasing one for a friend. No problem, so far, and have had mine a few months now. Good bang for the bucks.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Really like it when my hands a full of trash
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Really like it when my hands a full of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Sample

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: the bin has arrived! it is all crashed on one side. it works but it looks old and used. not a thing to enjoy! no thanks amazon ,,,
customer_reviews.author: Luminita Tecsy

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for 18 months now, its great. Sensor works perfectly and looks good in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Vibhav

customer_reviews.title: no more batteries
customer_reviews.text: While it didn't start that way, in about the 2nd year, my previous trash can required me to replace the 6 AA batteries every two weeks and I was tired of it. Massive love for the power adapter!
customer_reviews.author: Heather H. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: This is a good trash-can at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a trash-can that could fit under a counter which eliminated most of the foot-pedal cans. This can is a great price for an auto-opening can that's full-sized and is under 34 inches with the lid open. The motion detection can be a little tricky if you approach the can from the back or side, but it works okay. The included wall-adapter for power is convenient to avoid changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It’s impossible to get a trash bag out of this thing without dropping the can on your foot unless the bag is half full. It’s not that big, so who wants to use 20 trash bags a week?!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over traditional trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I wanted an automatic trash can. My wife convinced me to get one, and I'm glad she did. It's convenient, more sanitary, and the ring to secure the trash bag holds so much more trash. I empty the trash half as often now, since the bag stays in place. Plus the bag does not hang out. Very good product. My mom loved it, so I got her one too. Only minor knock is that it sometimes stays open and you have to push the close button, but that rarely happens.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Cassiba

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY GARBAGE CAN!!
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE HAD SEVERAL OF THESE TYPES OF GARBAGE CANS OVER MANY YEARS. THIS ONE IS GREAT. LOVE THE SHAPE - LARGE OPENING, OPEN A GOOD AMOUNT OF TIME, OVAL SHAPE EASIER TO SCRAPE PLATES, ETC....
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work beyond the first day
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend this product. Poor reliability. It worked the first day, and the first day only. I didn't have the chance to place trash in the bin inasmuch as the sensor function died.
customer_reviews.author: DRnSD

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same trash can at Costco but it was battery operated....hated it quit working in less then 24 hours. Returned bought this one with power adapter, never a moments problem! I absolutely love it! If you were to purchase this item, don’t get battery operated if you have more than one person in your household,
customer_reviews.author: Joyce McGee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our stainless steel kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd bought one years ago for my wife 1. Holds a ton more than you think 2. Easy empty and fill 3. Had a question ... immediate customer service (even after hours)
customer_reviews.author: Cropduster

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well looks nice seems very sensitive opens when I walk past it cat knows how to open it the dog can open it my one year old granddaughter can open it so wish it was less sensitive
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Products I Bought in 2018!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I bought in 2018! Works on either batteries or A/C. Very convenient! If the location you in which you want to use it has an outlet nearby, there's no need for batteries - a feature I have not found with other brands. Keeps the household pets out of the trash. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Hate to Shop

customer_reviews.title: I love this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Works well, nice size. Love having a sensor on the trash can. When I am making dinner and have my hands full of onion peel or a package that contained raw meat, I don't need to touch anything - just hold my hand near the sensor, and it opens right up. Easy to change the trash bag, and there is a ring that holds the bag firmly inside - no sliding down the cannister. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Love the fact that I can use ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love the fact that I can use power or battery for operating it. Changing out the bag is easy. The can itself is not heavy or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not operate the trash can
customer_reviews.text: Only operates with the ac adapter. Two sets of batteries were purchased; couldn't get the trash can to operate on the batteries. Very disappointed; wanted on of these products for so long, and finally get it, and now terrible.
customer_reviews.author: laura h.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have hands free waste disposal.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I was overindulging but it wasn’t long b4 I got used to hands free trash disposal. I think it’s great for high usage areas like kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my $$$
customer_reviews.text: I am so annoyed. This doesn't work w/ actually adapter, it doesn't work with batteries. I followed directions to "reset', still doesn't work!!!
customer_reviews.author: NightStarAngel

customer_reviews.title: Convenient motion detector trash can
customer_reviews.text: This automatic opening lid trash can really works. Could be a bit larger my only complaint but is so convenient and attractive in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: David Fredericks

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection could be a little better, but otherwise, this product lives up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: David Rothman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a for a week and so far I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. For the price I highly recommend it for anyone who loves keeping their home neat.
customer_reviews.author: christen

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I'm not super happy with this product the motion sensitivity is way to low and inconsistent. I have to hold my hand over the sensor sometimes for a couple seconds just to get the lid to open. We usually end up pushing the open button to make it work which defeats the point of having a motion sensor can. I would definitely look elsewhere next time.
customer_reviews.author: Code Jenson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a trash can. Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, the motion sensor is a bit too sensitive. On the other hand, if it weren’t sensitive enough, then the reviews would be skewed the other way. It’s a minor inconvenience for the benefit of hands-off lid action and odor control.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hodoba

customer_reviews.title: Best garbage can we’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after staying at an Airbnb that had one. It’s great when you have messy hands or hands full of trash . Just wave over and it opens. Walk by too close and it also opens...but does close automatically. Runs on battery or can be plugged in. Overall does what we wanted and is performing well.
customer_reviews.author: Harve's mom

customer_reviews.title: It works dependently.
customer_reviews.text: It's really too small for the kitchen trash but bigger trash cans mean heavier loads to carry so it's necessary to downsize to this.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Easy idea. Make a non battery dependent auto trash can. Works perfect every time and doesn’t drain your wallet if batteries. Had it 4 months and works perfectly still.
customer_reviews.author: Btheman3

customer_reviews.title: No Battery Needed
customer_reviews.text: As I was shopping for a sendor trash can, I specially look for a model that does not require batteries. This model turns out to work well and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Swane38

customer_reviews.title: Was great for only a month 😭
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited about this trash can but after only a couple months it’s quit working. Kinda bummed about it , it just won’t register at all and doesn’t work and it’s plugged in the wall. Def wouldn’t have spent the money if I knew it would only last a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: EASY, NO HANDS
customer_reviews.text: We really like this. Only thing I see as problem, is how sensitive it is. You can pass by close to it and it will open. Had to move to less traffic area. Really like!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is a good purchase for me. Perfect size, i like that i don’t need to use batteries and the sensor works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: The AC adapter, motion sensitivity and how easy it is to keep clean. Only draw back is Id like a taller and larger capacity waste can.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Eve

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten compliments on this - believe it or not! The shape makes it very attractive and it functions perfectly. Hides the bag too
customer_reviews.author: LJMR7

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a motion trash can. Get ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a motion trash can. Get this one. Batteries wear out quick on the battery powered ones.
customer_reviews.author: michael a ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Sure does open a lot
customer_reviews.text: A little too sensitive. I walk near it and it opens. I’ve tried contorting myself to see if it won’t open. I look like a ninja. Hahahaha. It works great though. Not sure how it cleans. Haven’t attempted that.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a clean kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love not having an open trash can in my kitchen to add smells or attract bugs. This trash can works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KippersMa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about a month now and love it. It freaked the dogs out at first. Our German Shepherd has figured out he can also open the trash can and no one gets hurt so everyone is okay. I wish we would have remembered to buy batteries. A hurricane knocked out our power and we back to the old fashioned way of opening a trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: SensorCan 13 Gallon Battery-FREE Automatic Sensor Kitchen Trash Can with Power Adapter, Oval Shape Stainless Steel Garbage Bin with AC Plug
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless Steel with AC13 Gallon Kitchen Trash Can – Touchless Sensor Lid - Stainless Steel – Oval 

Convenient and hygienic, SensorCan is the easy and clean way to dispose of trash in your home or office. Just move your hand toward the lid and the infrared sensor will open the lid automatically. The lid will close automatically when you are finished.

Infrared Motion Sensor opens the lid automatically with just the motion of your hand
Stainless Steel can body is fingerprint-proof and smudge-resistant. Silver-colored plastic lid is durable and easy to clean
Slim, spacing-saving oval shape allows it to fit comfortably into any setting
Trash Bag Retainer Ring keeps bags firmly in place and tucked out of view
Stop trash odors with the optional Natural Carbon Odor Filter Kit (sold separately)
Powered by 4 D batteries (not included) or AC Adapter (included)
Dimensions: 11.5” L x 16” W x 25.5” H (33” lid open H)
1 Year Manufacturer’s Warranty 
It is not a motion sensor. Hold your hand or object steadily (do not wave your hand) within 4-6 inches over sensor eye for it to detect and open.
feature_bullets: UNCONDITIONAL PROMISE – Your 100% satisfaction is assured and backed by a Full-Service Manufacturer's Promise including Parts and Dedicated Customer Support.
This deal includes AC Power Adapter for battery-free operation
100% Touchless Infrared Motion Sensor – No need to touch the lid! Just the motion of your hand opens the lid automatically

Perfect Kitchen Trash Can – 13 Gallon holds a week’s worth of trash, yet it is compact & space-saving. Versatile and adaptable slim, oval design and perfect for kitchen, office, garage, lobby, store, etc
Stainless Steel – This stainless steel trash can is fingerprint-proof and smudge-resistant. It has a modern, stylish design that looks great in the kitchen or office

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,195 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Wipe clean with slightly wet cloth and dry immediately.
specifications.Included Components: 13 Gal Trash Can with Sensor Lid, Retainer Ring, AC Adapter, Carbon Filter and Filter Gate
